messages.subject: e-pals
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Just want to say thanks to the person who figured out what my museum pass would be in us$ !!! I can t believe we are getting a pass for 7 people for a whole
messages.messageBody:
Hi  
Just want to say thanks to the person who figured out what my museum pass would be in us$
!!! I can't believe we are getting a pass for 7 people for a whole year for $18. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! incredible!!!!!!!
 
 
OK now onto the e_pals!!!
each of my kids has created an email group
Morgan is 14 but enjoys  kids of all ages her group is
teen_homeschoolers@egroups.com
Allison is 12 she also enjoys kids of all ages her groups is
homeschool_pre-teens@egroups.com
and Alex  is 10 he enjoys getting email from anyone his group is
homeschool_kids@egroups.com 
please let your kids know mine love having the groups!!!!!!!!
and they love to check their email to see who has sent them they check like twice a day!!!
hope to see all of your kids on the lists
 
Tanya mother to Morgan 14, Allison 12 , Alex 10 Jack 21/2 and Nick 8 mos
NE Ohio formerly from Kalamazoo michigan
Tanya 
www.geocities.com/athomemamaof5/Simpson_Unschoolers.html
 
"The secret of happiness is this: Let your interests be as
wide as possible, and let your reactions to the things and
persons that interest you be as far as possible friendly
rather than hostile."  --Bertrand Russell
